Thank you for your prompt reply.

What is IIRC? Can you give me a sample co=
mmand line?

I use the ArchiveReader class in a java tool to produce a cust=
om xml 
that contains info from the ArchiveRecordHeader instances (offsets =

etc...). And I can filter out anything that is not text/* at that 
level. =
The thing is that I do not know how to use the ArchiveReader 
class to get =
only the body without headers.

As for your suggestion, if IIRC is a comman=
d line tool, could you 
please give me an example command that gets from an=
 archive file the 
record stored at the specified offset? If it is a class =
or 
subproject, could you please tell me where in Heritrix it resides?

You=
rs Sincerely,
Cetin Sert
